files.patch:
@@ -131,3 +131,8 @@ - * Unlike the {@link InputStream#read(byte[],int,int) overridden method} - * of {@code InputStream}, this method might write more bytes than the returned - * number of inflated bytes into the buffer {@code b}. + *

Unlike the {@link InputStream#read(byte[],int,int) overridden method} + * of {@code InputStream}, this method might write some additional bytes beyond the + * last uncompressed byte. If n denotes the returned number of inflated bytes + * than {@code b[off]} trough {@code b[off+}n{@code -1]} will contain the + * uncompressed data while the elements {@code b[off+}n{@code ]} through + * {@code b[off+}len{@code -1]} are undefined and their value may or may not have + * been changed by the inflate operation. If the return value n is -1 the whole + * content of {@code b[off]} to {@code b[off+len-1]} will be undefined. @@ -138,1 +143,1 @@ - * @return the actual number of bytes inflated into {@code b}, or -1 if the end of the + * @return the actual number of inflated bytes, or -1 if the end of the
